page.title: 03ENTERTAINMENT IN SANDHEAD
page.content: by Irene Dalziel aged 11 In our village there is a Tennis Club and a Bowling Club. In the winter months the bowlers meet in the School Hall to play Carpet Bowls and the more active villagers play Badminton. The village is blessed with a good beach to which comes a small family firm of showpeople in the summer. The Tigh-na-mara Hotel provides entertainment and Discos as well as having a Pool table. One of the two village shops has an Amusement Arcade with One-armed Bandits, Space Invaders , Juke Boxes, and a Pool table. During the winter months the School Hall is used most Friday evenings for Whist Drives, Concerts, and Social Functions, which raise funds for a variety of organisations and charities supported by the community.
